oval:metadata.oval:description: The chronyd service should be enabled if possible.

service chronyd is configured to start and is running

oval:metadata.oval:title: Service sssd Disabled
oval:metadata.oval:description: The sssd service should be disabled if possible.

oval:criteria.comment: package sssd-common removed or service sssd is not configured to start
service sssd is not configured to start

oval:criterion.comment: Property LoadState of service sssd is masked
Property FragmentPath of service sssd is set to /dev/null

Test that the sssd service is not running

Test that the property FragmentPath from the service sssd is set to /dev/null
